hero.headline: Decoded Music
hero.hypeText: Unlock dynamic licenses that fit your project. Access a curated catalog of high-quality music, licensed exactly how you need it, for a price that just makes sense.

problemSolution.headline: Cut the Red Tape. Amplify Your Art.
problemSolution.problemBody: Navigating music rights is a headache. Finding tracks is hard, clearance takes forever, and usage is unclear.
problemSolution.solutionBody: We connect you directly. Browse curated, pre-cleared catalog, license instantly, and get real-time insights.
problemSolution.techMention: Powered by real-time data and scalable cloud infrastructure.

artistShowcase.headline: Artist Showcase
artistShowcase.featuredArtistBody: Explore the debut catalog from our foundational artist, Rue de Vivre. Unique soundscapes crafted for film, advertising, and content. Ready for instant preview and licensing.
artistShowcase.spotifyDisclaimer: Preview tracks via Spotify. Licensing occurs on Decoded Music.

dynamicPricing.headline: PRICING THAT ADAPTS TO YOU.
dynamicPricing.introText: Forget one-size-fits-all fees. Our smart pricing engine factors in exactly what you need:

howItWorksItems.text: üìà HOW BIG (Views for UGC / Project Scope)

dynamicPricing.priceDisclaimer: *For specific use cases and durations. Calculate your custom price.

useCases.title: FILM & VIDEO PROS
useCases.description: Seamlessly license tracks for documentaries, short films, and promotional videos.

useCases.title: UGC CREATORS
useCases.description: Access our library for social media content with UNBEATABLE CREATOR PRICING.

useCases.title: BRANDS & AGENCIES
useCases.description: Find the perfect sound for campaigns, commercials, and corporate content.

useCases.title: PODCASTERS
useCases.description: Intro/outro music, background tracks, and sound design elements for your show.

buyers.headline: For Brands & Creators: Your Next Project Needs Decoded Music.
buyers.introText: Stop sifting through endless libraries. Decoded Music provides the speed and clarity you need.

features.title: Intelligent Search
features.description: Powered by OpenSearch Serverless, find the perfect track instantly with precise filters.

features.title: Pre-Cleared Catalog
features.description: All tracks are pre-licensed for common use cases, enabling instant purchase and download.

features.title: Seamless Checkout
features.description: Our integrated flow (via Stripe/Aurora) makes licensing quick, easy, and secure.

features.title: High-Quality Assets
features.description: Access WAV/MP3 via secure S3 paths immediately after licensing.

features.title: Usage Tracking Dashboard
features.description: Monitor where and how you‚Äôve licensed music directly from your dashboard.

artists.headline: For Artists: Take Control with Your Unified Dashboard.
artists.introText: Gain unprecedented transparency and control over your music and earnings.

features.title: Catalog Management
features.description: Easily upload, manage metadata, and set licensing options via our dashboard (powered by API/DynamoDB).

features.title: Transparent Splits
features.description: Set and track revenue splits accurately and transparently (Aurora Serverless/QLDB detail).

features.title: Performance Analytics
features.description: Know exactly where your music is used globally with real-time insights (QuickSight/Kinesis/Glue/Redshift detail).

features.title: Rights Management
features.description: Securely manage legal documents and rights status (S3 legal storage).

features.title: Marketing Hub
features.description: Access tools to promote your music and connect with potential buyers (SES/SNS concepts).

features.title: Direct Licensing Opportunities
features.description: Get discovered and receive direct offers for exclusive projects.

collaboration.headline: Write with Rue de Vivre.
collaboration.bodyText: Producers, topliners, and lyricists‚Äîpitch ideas, co-write, and get credited on future releases.

aws.headline: Engineered for Excellence. Powered by AWS.
aws.bodyText: Leveraging the power and reliability of AWS cloud infrastructure for seamless licensing, secure data, and global scalability.

footer.privacyNote: We will not sell your data.
